Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch - ALAS2023LIVEPATCH-2023-010: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-6.1.29-47.49
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 - Kernel Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2022-48425:
	In the Linux kernel through 6.2.7, fs/ntfs3/inode.c has an invalid kfree because it does not validate MFT flags before replaying logs.
